about_the_game:
Embark on a cosmic journey of love and justice that spans galaxies and time. Play as Novalis, a Protostar Knight, forced to defend her hometown when evil forces attack her home. Determined to protect her home and her family, Novalis sets forth on a journey to defeat her foes, and bring peace back to her home.


FEATURES:

Uncover the story

Start off as Novalis, a newly graduated Knight, forced to fight against her own kind when war is raged on her hometown. Discover the beginnings of a century-long conflict, find the root of the evil that threatens your hometown, and protect those you hold dear.

Unlock Skills

Novalis is gifted The Sparkling Testimonial - a powerful artifact given on her day of Ascension. As Novalis and the artifact grow more connected to each other, unlock new skills and abilities that will help you fight back against the forces that threaten her livelihood.

Multiple Characters

Befriend new characters along your journey and play as them, unlocking new skills and costumes. Choose from one of several classes, from bomb wielding alchemist "Elown" to crit stacked spear wielder "Astrid".

Boss Rush

Challenge yourself against increasingly difficult bosses, from corrupted stars to gargantuan beasts. As you defeat more and more bosses, gain EXP and skill points to further develop your characters and their various ascensions.

Co-op Gameplay

Bored of playing solo? Challenge bosses with your friends and work together synergistically to destroy even the toughest raid bosses in The Great Attractor Plane.

name: Lightclusters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU (AMD FX-4300 or Intel i3-4130 or newer)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD / NVIDIA dedicated graphics card, with at least 2GB of dedicated VRAM and Shader Model 5.1 support (AMD R9 285 and NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or newer)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 9 compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU (AMD Ryzen 3 1300x or Intel i7-930 or newer)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD / NVIDIA dedicated graphics card, with 6GB of dedicated VRAM and Shader Model 6.0/6.1 support (i.e. AMD RX 580 8GB and NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or newer)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 9 compatible soundcard

short_description: Step into the world of Lightclusters - a 3D, ARPG set amongst the stars. Start off as Novalis, a young Star, suddenly forced to battle against her own kind when internal conflicts erupt. Take on unique and challenging bosses in your journey to defeat Tenebris, the leader of the Corrupted Stars.
